turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a drink from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you have a store location in mind

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, the one in Koko marina shopping center

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the koko marina shopping center in Hawaii kai, east side of honolulu

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, that is the one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: when do you want to make the order ready for pick up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: in about 10 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: very wel, what kind of drink would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am thinking

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: take your time

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am craving a mint chocolate mocha frabbucino with extra whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds delicious, is this on the menu?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: it may or may not be, but you can request them to make it for me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: add extra chocolate syrub on top of the whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you want this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the largest one they have, the extra large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: very well, should we use the account we have with them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just talked to them, and they do not have this on the menu currently, but they are willing to make it specially for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: wonderful, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the coffee will be ready for pick up soon, the receipt is being sent to your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome
